title: Day of Requests: Stage 2
body:
So, here is the list of Top 31 of games, which gathered the most upvotes in the First Stage of voting. Some of the games has been removed from the list due to different reasons: not cracked, not compressible, is actually a mod, etc.

Now you can choose a single game you think I should repack. Top 7 games with most votes will get their repack. Maybe more than seven, if I will feel so, depends on the weather here 🙂
